pkgmetadata.longdescription: Drop-in substitute for Py2.7's new collections.OrderedDict. The recipe has big-oh performance that matches regular dictionaries (amortized O(1) insertion/deletion/lookup and O(n) iteration/repr/copy/equality_testing).
